messages.title: Competent Leadership
messages.content: Job total hits record high while wages surge. Benefits cap 'leads more into work'. Tax cuts for workers and savers. The deficit down, income tax cut, more jobs, new businesses.

messages.title: Coalition of Chaos
messages.content: Labour plan to borrow risks £170bn extra debt. Labour is ransoming Salmond Scottish alliance. Spending up, more debt, higher taxes, jobs lost.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Preserve our NHS and its vital hospital services.
Boost our local businesses, jobs and apprenticeships.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour, SNP, Vince Cable, Lib Dems

issues.economy: Job total hits record high while wages surge, Tax cuts for workers and savers, The deficit down, more jobs, new businesses
issues.health: Preserve our NHS and its vital hospital services.

leaflet.personalStatement: My plan for Maidstone & The Weald

images.caption: Pembury Hospital - Maidstone and The Weald Needs its Maternity. Save Our Maternity.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Election Communication. Promoted by Andrew Kennedy on behalf of Helen Grant (Conservative Election Campaign), both of Suite 3, Ruxton Business Centre, Ruxton Farm, Ruxton Road, Maidstone, Kent, ME14 3BF.
